revised_title: Research on the Minute Anatomy of the Alimentary Canal
tldr: This article examines the minute anatomy of the alimentary canal, focusing on the mucous membrane of the small intestine and the process of fat absorption. The author describes the structure of the epithelium, the role of the reticulum, and the differences between cells in lymphatic follicles and villi. The study also discusses fat absorption through the reticulum and the structure of the plicae villorum.
